extendedInfo.description: Go. Make. It. Rain.Itâs that simple. Turn up some Fat Joe, blast the Rack City, and Make those bills Rain over your friends and unsuspecting people around you.- Go Make It Rain on your friends, enemies, parents, and dare we say teachers, snap an in-app photo, and share it to Facebook or Instagram right from the app.- The more you share, the more you win. Start with US cheddar, skrilla, moula, dolla dolla bills (Oh, we mean Dollars) and unlock additional currencies like Japanâs Zen Yen or the Mother Landâs Russian Ruble.- Feel like you are a true baller, like you shouldn't be Raining anything but the Benjamins, baby? Become a High Roller and unlock ALL currencies, get rid of ads, and Go Make It Rain with the highest bill denominations every currency has to offer. Did we mention Raining nothing but Benjamins? Oh yeah, we did.*** Go Make It Rain features **** Content- 6 currencies from around the world- Over 30 combined denominations (bill values)- UNLIMITED bills to Rain give you deeper pockets than you could ever imagine- LISTEN to your money flick off the top of your stack and descend around you- TAKE a photo mid-Rain, with or without flash, and SHARE it from in game or access it any time in your Gallery- SHARE your Rain mayhem over both Facebook and Instagram- UNLOCK more currencies with the more Rain photos you share- TRACK how much total Rain youâve made in every currency- ACCESS High Roller status in the Vault and instantly get rid of ads, UNLOCK all currencies, and UNVEIL the High Roller EXCLUSIVE top denominations for every currency* Design- Stunning 3D bills Rain down over the heads of your friends and foes- Incorporated augmented reality allows the bills to surround you in a complete virtual environment- Every bill individually cues as it reaches the top of your stack and becomes ready to RainKeep your wallet full without giving up on the joys of Making It Rain.Connect with us: Visit us at www.gomakeitrain.com or email us at support@gomakeitrain.com Follow us at @GoMakeItRain or on Facebook at www.facebook.com/GoMakeItRain.*Arrow flag used with permission from the original creator, Reddit user BasqueInGlory*Sloth photo used with permission from the original photographer, Matthew Magellan

reviews.comment: This app got me thrown out of the strip club.

reviews.title: Brilliantly bizarre
reviews.comment: Does what is states on the tin. Well executed app. Everything works flawlessly. Looking forward to seeing what else the developer is capable of!

reviews.comment: Tight
reviews.author: Aaron Rivera

reviews.title: I love the Rain
reviews.comment: This app is very fun and simple to use and my 3 year old loves making it rain.  All the detail in the app makes the bills so realistic and i love showing it to peoples and seeing there reaction.  Its great and fun for everyone. Let it RAIN$$$
reviews.author: ruben rivera

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Satisfies all need I ever wanted. The physics are well done and everything about the app is high quality. Would recommend.
reviews.author: Patrick Fedigan

reviews.title: Upvotes?!
reviews.comment: You can make it rain with upvotes? Never have I ever wanted a cat more than right now.
reviews.author: Ryan Baxter

reviews.title: Rain.
reviews.comment: Go Make it Rain. A metaphorical yet tangible rain that speaks volumes about life and the pursuit of happiness.  This app is creative, well designed, and true to sharing the feelings of success and joy to other users through the easy to use UI and sharing capabilities.  I\'d recommend this app as its current features are just a small taste of what might be in store in the future. Download, enjoy, and go make it rain!
reviews.author: Hector Zhu

reviews.title: Really solid app
reviews.comment: The animations in this are really smooth and look great.  It was pretty fun making it rain on some buddies and taking photos.  I liked how looking around with the camera moved the bills too as if it was in the real world.
reviews.author: Ilya Seletsky

reviews.title: Solid
reviews.comment: Really smooth and really impressive animations.  This app is lots of fun.
reviews.author: Anthony Lenz

reviews.title: Easily the best app
reviews.comment: this has been one of my best life decisions. Can not go wrong if you\'re making it rain!

reviews.comment: I\'ve never had so much fun photographing my cats.
